name: Drawing for an Inkstand
description: Drawing for an Inkstand; Attributed to Robert-Joseph Auguste (French, 1723 - 1805, master by royal order 1757); Paris, France; about 1780; Black ink with watercolor washes in blue, yellow, and crimson; 44 x 38.9 cm (17 5/16 x 15 5/16 in.); 79.GA.181; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
title: Drawing for an Inkstand
medium: Black ink with watercolor washes in blue, yellow, and crimson
